metadata.title: USN-2387-1 -- pollinate update
metadata.description: The pollinate package bundles the certificate for entropy.ubuntu.com. This update refreshes the certificate to match the one currently used on the server.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-2387-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  pollinate - 4.7-0ubuntu1.2 No subscription required
